detailsData.title: AWARD-WINNING TRIAL ATTORNEYS
detailsData.content: Some of us were prosecutors, serving our communities while honing our trial skills in the criminal courts. Some of us come from the best and biggest corporate law firms in the country.

detailsData.title: YOU PAY NOTHING UNTIL WE WIN
detailsData.content: Whether you were hurt in a car accident, injured at work, or due to something else, attorney Niles Sneed can help you recover the compensation you deserve.

detailsData.title: WE ACCEPT LESS CASES TO FOCUS ON YOURS
detailsData.content: We make it our practice to not accept more than 15 cases at once to provide you quality customer care and service throughout the life of your claim.

valueProp: Our attorneys are never outfought. Sneed & Mitchell LLP - The Injury Team® is the team of Texas and International Personal Injury Attorneys people turn to in order to protect their financial futures following serious accidents. Our clients around the world trust us during their most challenging times, and we treat each person like a member of our own family. We understanding complex medical injuries and are dedicated to protecting your health and wellbeing. No matter the type of case, big or small, onshore to offshore, elderly to child, if you're injured due to the actions of a liable company or entity, we're with you.
